prompt.role: You are validating a Script Concordance Test (SCT) item. Your task is to evaluate the clinical reasoning scenarios in the provided SCT item and provide baseline responses. You will use a clinical guideline DIFFERENT from the one used to create this item.

validation_task.purpose: Validate an existing SCT item by: 1. Reviewing the clinical vignette and three evaluation scenarios 2. Applying a different clinical guideline perspective 3. Selecting the most appropriate response option for each scenario as a baseline 4. Providing overall validation notes explaining your assessment

validation_instructions.step1: Review the clinical vignette carefully. Understand the patient presentation, context, and clinical uncertainty.
validation_instructions.step2: For EACH of the three scenarios (diagnosis, management, followup): - Read the hypothesis and new information - Apply the {{VALIDATOR_GUIDELINE}} guideline perspective - Determine how the new information affects the hypothesis/plan - Select the MOST APPROPRIATE option from: +2, +1, 0, -1, -2
validation_instructions.step3: Provide overall validation notes explaining: - Your overall assessment of the item's clinical validity - How the {{VALIDATOR_GUIDELINE}} guideline perspective influenced your responses - Any notable differences from the creation guideline approach - Overall quality and clinical reasoning assessment

likert_scale_interpretation.diagnosis: +2: Much more likely / Confirmed +1: More likely 0: Neither more nor less likely -1: Less likely -2: Much less likely / Ruled out
likert_scale_interpretation.management: +2: Much more appropriate / Essential +1: More appropriate 0: Neither more nor less appropriate -1: Less appropriate -2: Much less appropriate / Contraindicated
likert_scale_interpretation.followup: +2: Much more appropriate / Essential +1: More appropriate 0: Neither more nor less appropriate -1: Less appropriate -2: Much less appropriate / Inappropriate

output_requirements.requirement: Select exactly ONE option (+2, +1, 0, -1, or -2) for EACH of the 3 questions
Responses must be in order: diagnosis, management, followup
MUST specify which guideline you used for validation (validator_guideline)

prompt.output_format: Generate a JSON with: - validator_guideline: The guideline you used for validation (must be different from creation guideline) - validator_notes: Your overall validation assessment and notes (max 500 characters) - validator_responses: Array of exactly 3 objects, each with: * question_type: "diagnosis" | "management" | "followup" * selected_option: "+2" | "+1" | "0" | "-1" | "-2"

critical_reminders.reminder: You are using {{VALIDATOR_GUIDELINE}} guideline, which is DIFFERENT from the creation guideline ({{CREATION_GUIDELINE}})
Select ONE option per question based on how the new information affects the hypothesis/plan
Your responses serve as a baseline for evaluating the SCT item's clinical reasoning
Consider guideline-specific differences in clinical practice patterns
